title: Custom T-shirt, Tote Bags, Socks - Yoshirt
description:
Yoshirt is the best way to DESIGN and ORDER custom tshirts, tank tops, tote bags, stash sacks, socks and more complete in-app! With a few taps, you can use our editor to design your own apparel and have it shipped to you. It's that easy!
*NOTE: Yoshirt ordering and shipping is currently available only in the US and Canada.
Millions of people use Yoshirt to share their creativity:
- Want to represent your team and crew? Create personalized clothes and accessories by snapping a pic or selecting a photo!
- Looking for a funny birthday card or gift? Step it up by sending a customized tshirt with your design!
- Share your creations on Instagram, Pinterest and more
- Enjoy fast, secure checkout with Apple Pay
Once you're done designing, we print your shirt, socks, or bag using our efficient digital printing process and ship it right to you!
Connect with @yoshirtinc on Instagram-Pinterest-Twitter-Facebook and use #yoshirt.
If you have questions or feedback contact us at help@yoshirt.com.
Stay crispy and keep it fly.
